presets.name: Grunge Mud Buzz
presets.summary: Raw and gritty tone drenched in angst. Thick, distorted mids with room to breathe for haunting choruses and unpolished solos.

presets.name: Dirt Sludge Grind
presets.summary: Thick, sludgy gain with a menacing low-end punch. Perfect for dark riffs and layered vocal harmonies with rich phasing textures.

presets.name: Superunknown Crunch
presets.summary: Massive, open crunch with a distinctive midrange growl. Tailored for heavy riffs and psychedelic-infused solo passages.
